a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Difference between female and male life expectancy at age 45,
Female minus male life expectancy conditional on reaching age 45. Estimates are based on period life tables and are expressed as
expected age at death, not as years left to live.
Data source: Human Mortality Database (2018) and others
